article_title: Breaking down a Trump speech: His words show the power of a new politics
article_text:
Political observers and The Star looks behind the words of a Donald Trump speech

His stream-of-consciousness speaking style seems as effective as it is unconventional

Where other candidates carefully parse their words, Trump is anything but nuanced

article_metadata.news-keywords: Trump, speech, analysis, politics, campaign, Donald Trump, election, presidential, 2016
article_metadata.title: Breaking down a Trump speech: His words show the power of a new politics | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Dissecting a Donald Trump speech reveals simple and effective language, a heaping dose of bravado and a loose relationship with facts or specific policies.
og.title: Breaking down a Trump speech: His words show the power of a new politics
